message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique and valuable product. I think you'll really appreciate its features and benefits. I'm willing to sell it to you for $25000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I have to make a profit. I can do $22000, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $19500. Can you meet me at that price?

I can see you're really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $19500. I can do $21000, and that's my final offer on the product. If you're not interested, I have other buyers waiting.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $19500 is too high. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $19500 and $21000. How about $20250?
I'm not willing to go all the way to $20250, but I can meet you halfway between $20250 and $21000. How about $20625? That's as close to my target as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $20000. Can you consider that?

I've already met you at $20625, and now you're asking me to go back down to $20000? I'm not willing to do that. I can do $20500, and that's my final offer. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still not sure if I can meet you at $20500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $20500 and $20000. How about $20250?
